catalog.name: Network infrastructure
catalog.description: This collection includes information on voltage flows and quality, and provides the mapping of high voltage power lines. This information is useful to support assessments of the energy system as a whole and to identify potential critical issues.

members.name: Municipalities with Primary Substations with flow reversal
members.description: Municipal-scale map of reverse energy events detected in 2015 in primary substations, categorized according to duration. The data concerning the flow cabins owned by e-distribuzione and the data for the years 2015 and/or 2020 are visible. These data only include information from the company Enel Distribuzione, which covers around 85% of the energy served by primary substations in Italy (the remaining 15% is handled by around 100 other distributors). The data refer only to the primary substations WITH flow inversion, they do not report the substations WITHOUT flow inversion. The mapped information is correct as regards the municipalities with substations with 1% or 5% flow inversion, it is uncertain for the municipalities not mentioned (they could be from other operators with flow inversion or from e-distribuzione with zero inversion).
